fixed_skill.desc: Decrease all foes' Defense by 27.1%/28.5%/29.8% for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Marakunda

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Agidyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 154.5/162.2/170.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Brave Blade

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20.9%. Increase Burn accuracy by 35%. If foe's HP is 50% or more, increase effect by 30% more.
passive_skill.name: Lord of Flames

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20.9%. Increase Burn accuracy by 40%. If foe's HP is 50% or more, increase effect by 30% more.
passive_skill.name: Lord of Flames I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20.9%. Increase Burn accuracy by 45%. If foe's HP is 50% or more, increase effect by 30% more.
passive_skill.name: Lord of Flames II

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20.9%. Increase Burn accuracy by 50%. If foe's HP is 50% or more, increase effect by 30% more.
passive_skill.name: Lord of Flames III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
